roleset.name: fine needle aspiration - suck out fluid with a fine needle
roleset.note: FNA-V NOTES: Based on temprel data. Relation to aspirate.101. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from fna.01-v)

roles.note: This should be a noun but when it is in acronym form, it is used as a verb. (from fna.01-v)

example.name: doc only
example.text: I have asked [them-2] [Pro-2} to stage the lesion , tattoo below the lesion , and FNA if indicated .

example.name: be careful! The place aspirated is most likely the SOURCE
